testCase.description: Test Case 1: Verify that users are able to upload the correct type of file format.
Test Case 2: Verify that the application does not allow users to upload malicious file formats.
Test Case 3: Verify that the application displays an error message when the maximum file size is exceeded.
Test Case 4: Verify that users are able to upload the correct type of file format.
Test Case 5: Verify that the application does not allow users to upload malicious file formats.
Test Case 6: Verify that the application displays an error message when the maximum file size is exceeded.
